ideas.title: Ex-Splunk execs’ startup Resolve AI hits $1 billion valuation with Series A
ideas.description: The round was led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, according to people familiar with the deal.
hooks: AI Startups: The $1B Valuation Playbook Revealed
How Ex-Splunk Leaders Cracked the Funding Code
Resolve AI: Turning Enterprise Insights into Billions

ideas.title: Yann LeCun confirms his new ‘world model’ startup, reportedly seeks $5B+ valuation

ideas.title: Hardware’s brutal week: iRobot, Luminar, and Rad Power go bankrupt
ideas.description: The hardware world had a brutal week, with iRobot, Luminar, and Rad Power Bikes all filing for bankruptcy.  Each company faces its own mix of tariff pressures, supply chain issues, and shifting markets, but together they tell a larger story about the challenges of building physical products in an era of global trade tensions and […]
hooks: Hardware's Apocalypse: When Innovation Meets Bankruptcy
3 Tech Titans' Fatal Business Mistakes Revealed

tips: Include real-time data visualizations of bankruptcy trends

Use personal anecdotes about startup challenges
Deep-dive into root cause analysis
Include expert quotes and industry perspectives

Focus on professional lessons and strategic insights
Include executive-level analysis of market shifts
Highlight actionable takeaways for tech entrepreneurs

visualDirection.description: Dark, moody color palette with deep blues and grays. Fractured, deconstructed typography suggesting breakdown. Infographic-style data visualizations with sharp geometric overlays. Incorporate subtle glitch effects to represent technological disruption. Reference visual styles of WIRED and MIT Technology Review.

ideas.title: OpenAI adds new teen safety rules to ChatGPT as lawmakers weigh AI standards for minors
ideas.description: OpenAI updated its guidelines for how its AI models should behave with users under 18, and published new AI literacy resources for teens and parents. Still, questions remain about how well policies translate into practice.
hooks: AI Safety Revolution: Protecting Teens in the Digital Age
Teens, AI, and Safety: What You Need to Know
OpenAI's New Playbook for Teenage Digital Wellness

tips: Include personal narrative about AI interactions with younger users
Use interactive polls to engage reader participation
